data.oai_dc:dc: Morphological wing measurements of 111 drosophilid species

Content of datafile (repeated from README.txt):Species: species identifier hopefully self explanatory, normally [first letter in genus]_[species or subspecies, abbreviated], see table S6 in Bolstad et al. 2015 for the scientific name, ID: individual fly ID in the form of the picture name,Date: the date the image of the fly was taken (day_month_year), Sex: the sex of each fly, where F codes for female and M codes for male, WingSize: the size of each fly's wing in log(mm) (square root of area on the natural logarithmic scale), L2Length: length of vein L2 in log(mm), where log is the natural logarithm
